title: Is NCERT good for JEE? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Absolutely!! Yes NCERT is best for JEE. every year jee toppers recommended studying the basic from NCERT book with the help of NCERT solution the foundation of each subject in jei can be strengthened also it is easier to quickly it is revised basic concept with the chapter summary is given NCERT textbook. As competitiveness of the examination has increased over the years, that's why online platform like “MyPustak” grown up making available number of books and guides for the students. If you want to buy NCERT book you can visit online book store MyPustak. People are able to get books at FREE OF COST.
